abs550aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Optical thickness of atmospheric aerosols at wavelength 550 nanometers.
abs550aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Ambient Aerosol Absorption Optical Thickness at 550nm

abs550bc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the black carbon aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550dust_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the dust aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550no3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the nitrate aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550oa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the particular organic matter aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550so4_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the sulphate aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

abs550ss_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the sea salt aerosol optical depth at 550nm due to absorption

airmass_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: The mass of air in an atmospheric layer.
airmass_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Vertically Integrated Mass Content of Air in Layer

aoanh_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Fixed surface layer mixing ratio over 30o-50oN (0 ppbv), uniform fixed source (at all levels) everywhere else (source is unspecified but must be constant in space and time and documented). Note that the source could be 1yr/yr, so the tracer concentration provides mean age in years. For method using linearly increasing tracer include a method attribute: "linearly increasing tracer"For method using uniform source (1yr/yr) include a method attribute: "uniform source"

bry_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Total family (the sum of all appropriate species in the model) ; list the species in the netCDF header, e.g. Bry = Br + BrO + HOBr + HBr + BrONO2 + BrCl Definition: Total inorganic bromine (e.g., HBr and inorganic bromine oxides and radicals (e.g., BrO, atomic bromine (Br), bromine nitrate (BrONO2)) resulting from degradation of bromine-containing organicsource gases (halons, methyl bromide, VSLS), and natural inorganic bromine sources (e.g., volcanoes, sea salt, and other aerosols) add comment attribute with detailed description about how the model calculates these fields
bry_tavg-p39-hy-air.long_name: Total Inorganic Bromine Volume Mixing Ratio

bs550aer_tpt-l-hxy-u.comment: Aerosol  Backscatter at wavelength 550nm and scattering angle 180 degrees, computed from extinction and lidar ratio

c2h6_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c3h6_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c3h8_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ccldncl_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.comment: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Convective Cloud Tops
ccldncl_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.long_name: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Convective Cloud Tops

ccn02_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the concentration of cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) at 0.2% supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size

ccn1_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the concentration of cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) at 1.0 percent supersaturation, based on aerosol chemical composition and size

ccn_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.long_name: Cloud Condensation Nuclei Concentration at Liquid Cloud Top

cdnc_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration in liquid water clouds.

cfc114_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction of cfc114 in air

ch3coch3_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction "mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y", where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as "nitrogen" or a phrase such as "nox_expressed_as_nitrogen". Acetone is an organic molecule with the chemical formula CH3CH3CO. The IUPAC name for acetone is propan-2-one. Acetone is a member of the group of organic compounds known as ketones. There are standard names for the ketone group as well as for some of the individual species.

ch4_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ch4_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

chepasoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Net Production of Anthropogenic Secondary Organic Aerosol

chepsoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: If model lumps SOA emissions with POA, then the sum of POA and SOA emissions is reported as OA emissions. "mass" refers to the mass of primary organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone.
chepsoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Chemical Production of Dry Aerosol Secondary Organic Matter

cly_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Total family (the sum of all appropriate species in the model) ; list the species in the netCDF header, e.g. Cly = HCl + ClONO2 + HOCl + ClO + Cl + 2\*Cl2O2 +2Cl2 + OClO + BrCl Definition: Total inorganic stratospheric chlorine (e.g., HCl, ClO) resulting from degradation of chlorine-containing source gases (CFCs, HCFCs, VSLS), and natural inorganic chlorine sources (e.g., sea salt and other aerosols) add comment attribute with detailed description about how the model calculates these fields
cly_tavg-p39-hy-air.long_name: Total Inorganic Chlorine Volume Mixing Ratio

co2_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: This is the daily mean for CO volume mixing ratio in lowest model layer

cod_tavg-u-hxy-cl.comment: The optical thickness is the integral along the path of radiation of a volume scattering/absorption/attenuation coefficient. The radiative flux is reduced by a factor exp(-optical_thickness) on traversing the path. A coordinate variable of radiation_wavelength or radiation_frequency can be specified to indicate that the optical thickness applies at specific wavelengths or frequencies. The atmosphere optical thickness applies to radiation passing through the entire atmosphere. "Cloud" means the component of extinction owing to the presence of liquid or ice water particles. The specification of a physical process by the phrase due_to_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase.

conccn_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the number concentration of air particles in air

conccn_tpt-u-hxys-u.comment: The variable represents the instantaneous Aerosol Number Concentration at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
conccn_tpt-u-hxys-u.long_name: Sub-daily Aerosol Number Concentration at CF sites

depdust_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Fdry mass deposition rate of dust

drybc_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Dry Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

drynh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Monthly Dry Deposition Rate of NH3 at surface

dryno3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Loss rate of nitrate (NO3) aerosol from the atmosphere due to dry deposition

dryoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Dry Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter

dryss_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Dry Deposition Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

emiaco_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic CO

emianox_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Store flux as Nitrogen. Anthropogenic fraction. NOx=NO+NO2, Includes agricultural waste burning but no other biomass burning. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emianox_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic NOx

emiaoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic Organic Aerosol

emibbbc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of black carbon aerosol into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbbc_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission rate of black carbon aerosol mass from all biomass burning

emibbch4_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of methane (CH4) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbch4_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission of CH4 from all biomass burning

emibbco_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of carbon monoxide (CO) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbco_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission rate of CO from all biomass burning

emibbdms_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbdms_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission of DMS from all biomass burning

emibbnh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of ammonia (NH3) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbnh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission rate of NH3 from all biomass burning

emibbnox_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of nitrogen oxides (NOx) from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbnox_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission rate of NOx from all biomass burning

emibboa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of particulate organic matter (organic aerosol) into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibboa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission of organic aerosol from all biomass burning

emibbso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of SO2 into the atmosphere from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic).
emibbso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission rate of SO2 from all biomass burning

emibbvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total emission rate of non-methane volatile organic compounds (NMVOCs) from all biomass burning (natural and anthropogenic)
emibbvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: total emission rate of NMVOC from all biomass burning

emibc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emibc_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

emibvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field._If_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.
emibvoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Biogenic NMVOC

emico_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emidms_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emidust_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emiisop_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field

emilnox_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Integrate the NOx production for lightning over model layer. proposed name: tendency_of_atmosphere_mass_content_of_nox_from_lightning

eminh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

eminox_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Store flux as Nitrogen. NOx=NO+NO2. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emioa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the sum of total emission of POA and total production of SOA (emipoa+chepsoa). "Mass" refers to the mass of organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone. We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4\*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available.  Integrate 3D chemical production and emission field vertically to 2d field.
emioa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Primary Emission and Chemical Production of Dry Aerosol Organic Matter

emiso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emiso4_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Direct primary emission does not include secondary sulfate production. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emiso4_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Direct Emission Rate of SO4

emiss_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emiss_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

emivoc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field. _If_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.

hcfc22_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the mole fraction of HCFC22 in air

hcho_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

hcl_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of hydrogen chloride is HCl.

hcl_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of hydrogen chloride is HCl.

hfc125_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the mole fraction of HFC125 in air

hfc134a_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the mole fraction of HFC134a in air

hno3_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

hno3_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ho2_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of hydroperoxyl radical is HO2.

isop_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction of isoprene in air.

lossco_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Monthly Loss of Atmospheric Carbon Monoxide

lossn2o_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Monthly Loss of Atmospheric Nitrous Oxide

lwp_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: The total mass of liquid water in cloud per unit area.

meanage_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: The mean age of air is defined as the mean time that a stratospheric air mass has been out of contact with the well-mixed troposphere.

mmraerh2o_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mass fraction is used in the construction mass_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. It means the ratio of the mass of X to the mass of Y (including X). "Aerosol" means the system of suspended liquid or solid particles in air (except cloud droplets) and their carrier gas, the air itself. "Ambient_aerosol" means that the aerosol is measured or modelled at the ambient state of pressure, temperature and relative humidity that exists in its immediate environment. "Ambient aerosol particles" are aerosol particles that have taken up ambient water through hygroscopic growth. The extent of hygroscopic growth depends on the relative humidity and the composition of the particles.

mmraerh2o_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean Aerosol water mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer
mmraerh2o_tavg-u-hm-u.long_name: Daily mean surface Aerosol water mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmraerh2o_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface aerosol water Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
mmraerh2o_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Instantaneous surface aerosol water mass mixing ratio at CF sites

mmrbc_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Dry mass fraction of black carbon aerosol particles in air.

mmrbc_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean elemental carbon mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrbc_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface elemental carbon Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours

mmrdust_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Dry mass fraction of dust aerosol particles in air.

mmrdust_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean dust aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrdust_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface Dust Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
mmrdust_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Instantaneous surface Dust Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites

mmrnh4_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Dry mass fraction of ammonium aerosol particles in air.

mmrnh4_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean NH4 mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrnh4_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface NH4 Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
mmrnh4_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Instantaneous surface NH4 aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites

mmrno3_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Dry mass fraction of nitrate aerosol particles in air.

mmrno3_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean NO3 aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrno3_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface NO3 Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
mmrno3_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Instantaneous surface NO3 aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites

mmroa_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4\*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available.
mmroa_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Total Organic Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio

mmroa_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean total organic aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmroa_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface organic aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours.
mmroa_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Instantaneous surface total organic aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites

mmrpm10_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 10 micrometers

mmrpm1_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 1 micrometers

mmrpm2p5_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 2.5 micrometers

mmrso4_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Dry mass of sulfate (SO4) in aerosol particles as a fraction of air mass.

mmrso4_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean sulfate aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrso4_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable is for instantaneous surface mass mixing ratio of sulfate aerosol at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
mmrso4_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Instantaneous Aerosol Sulfate Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites

mmrsoa_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mass fraction in the atmosphere of secondary organic aerosols (particulate organic matter formed within the atmosphere from gaseous precursors; dry mass).
mmrsoa_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Secondary Organic Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio

mmrsoa_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean secondary organic aerosol mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrss_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mass fraction in the atmosphere of sea salt aerosol (dry mass).

mmrss_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Daily mean Sea Salt mass mixing ratio in lowest model layer

mmrss_tpt-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents instantaneous surface sea salt aerosol mass mixing ratio at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
mmrss_tpt-u-hm-u.long_name: Sea salt Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio at CF sites

n2o_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.   The chemical formula of  nitrous oxide is N2O.

n2o_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.   The chemical formula of  nitrous oxide is N2O.

nh50_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Fixed surface layer mixing ratio over 30o-50oN (100ppbv), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.

no2_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

no_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

noy_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Total family (the sum of all appropriate species in the model); list the species in the netCDF header, e.g. NOy = N + NO + NO2 + NO3 + HNO3 + 2N2O5 + HNO4 + ClONO2 + BrONO2 Definition: Total reactive nitrogen; usually includes atomic nitrogen (N), nitric oxide (NO), NO2, nitrogen trioxide (NO3), dinitrogen radical (N2O5), nitric acid (HNO3), peroxynitric acid (HNO4), BrONO2, ClONO2 add comment attribute with detailed description about how the model calculates these fields
noy_tavg-p39-hy-air.long_name: Total Reactive Nitrogen Volume Mixing Ratio

o3_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

o3_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

o3loss_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: ONLY provide the sum of the following reactions: (i) O(1D)+H2O; (ii) O3+HO2; (iii) O3+OH; (iv) O3+alkenes (isoprene, ethene,...)

o3prod_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: ONLY provide the sum of all the HO2/RO2 + NO reactions (as k\*[HO2]\*[NO])

o3ref_tavg-l-hxy-u.cell_methods: area: time: mean (monthly mean fixed annual cycle)
o3ref_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: This is the ozone mole fraction that is used in a diagnostic call to the model's radiation scheme. It is only applicable when an ozone double call is active in the model.
o3ref_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Fixed Reference Climatology of Mole Fraction of Ozone in Air

od443aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: This is the aerosol optical depth (AOD) from the ambient aerosls (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 443 nm"

od550aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: AOD from ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 550 nm"

od550bb_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: total organic aerosol AOD due to biomass burning (excluding so4, nitrate BB components)
od550bb_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm Due to Biomass Burning

od550bc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to black carbon aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550csaer_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: AOD from the ambient aerosols in clear skies if od550aer is for all-sky (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 550 nm"

od550dust_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to dust aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550lt1aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: od550 due to particles with wet diameter less than 1 um  ("ambient" means "wetted"). When models do not include explicit size information, it can be assumed that all anthropogenic aerosols and natural secondary aerosols have diameter less than 1 um.
od550lt1aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Ambient Fine Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm

od550no3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to nitrate aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550oa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: total organic aerosol AOD, comprises all organic aerosols, primary + secondary ; natural + anthropogenic including biomasss burning organic aerosol
od550oa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Total Organic Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm

od550so4_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to sulfate aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550soa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: total organic aerosol AOD due to secondary aerosol formation
od550soa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Particulate Organic Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm

od550ss_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to sea salt aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od865aer_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: AOD from the ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute "wavelength: 865 nm"

oh_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

oh_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

pan_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

pfull_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: The atmospheric pressure at the model layer midpoints for all times and levels in the associated output variables

phalf_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: The atmospheric pressure at the model layer interfaces for all times and levels in the associated output variables

photo1d_tavg-l-hxy-u.long_name: Photolysis Rate of Ozone (O3) to Excited Atomic Oxygen (the Singlet D State, O1D)

pod0_tsum-u-hxy-u.comment: Accumulated stomatal ozone flux over the threshold of 0 mol m-2 s-1; Computation: Time Integral of (hourly above canopy ozone concentration \* stomatal conductance \* Rc/(Rb+Rc) )

reffcclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.cell_methods: area: time: mean where convective_cloud (weighted by total convective cloud area)
reffcclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.comment: Cloud-Top Effective Droplet Radius in Convective Cloud
reffcclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.long_name: Cloud-Top Effective Droplet Radius in Convective Cloud

reffccwctop_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.comment: Cloud-Top Effective Radius of Liquid or Ice Cloud at Liquid or Ice Cloud Top
reffccwctop_tavg-u-hxy-ccl.long_name: Cloud-Top Effective Radius of Liquid or Ice Cloud at Liquid or Ice Cloud Top

reffclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-cl.comment: Droplets are liquid only.  This is the effective radius "as seen from space" over liquid cloudy portion of grid cell. This is the value from uppermost model layer with liquid cloud or, if available, or for some models it is the sum over all liquid cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere.TOA) each time sample when computing monthly mean. Reported values are weighted by total liquid cloud top fraction of  (as seen from TOA) each time sample when computing monthly mean.

reffsclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-scl.cell_methods: area: time: mean where stratiform_cloud (weighted by total stratiform cloud area)
reffsclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-scl.comment: Cloud-Top Effective Droplet Radius in Stratiform Cloud
reffsclwtop_tavg-u-hxy-scl.long_name: Cloud-Top Effective Droplet Radius in Stratiform Cloud

rluscsaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Flux corresponding to rluscs resulting from an aerosol-free call to radiation
rluscsaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Surface Upwelling Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation

rlutaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Flux corresponding to rlut resulting fom aerosol-free call to radiation

rlutcsaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Flux corresponding to rlutcs resulting fom aerosol-free call to radiation
rlutcsaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation

rsutaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Flux corresponding to rsut resulting fom aerosol-free call to radiation

rsutcsaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Flux corresponding to rsutcs resulting fom aerosol-free call to radiation
rsutcsaf_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Shortwave Radiation

scldncl_tavg-u-hxy-scl.comment: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Stratiform Cloud Tops
scldncl_tavg-u-hxy-scl.long_name: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration of Stratiform Cloud Tops

sfno2_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.
sfno2_tavg-u-hm-u.long_name: NO2 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

sfo3_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.
sfo3_tavg-u-hm-u.long_name: O3 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

sfo3max_tstat-u-hm-u.comment: maximum near-surface ozone  (add cell_methods attribute "time: maximum")
sfo3max_tstat-u-hm-u.long_name: Daily Maximum O3 Volume Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

sfpm10_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Hourly PM10 Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

sfpm1_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Hourly PM1.0 Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

sfpm25_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Mass fraction of atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 2.5 micrometers. To specify the relative humidity and temperature at which the particle size applies, provide scalar coordinate variables with the standard names of "relative_humidity" and "air_temperature".
sfpm25_tavg-u-hm-u.long_name: PM2.5 Mass Mixing Ratio in Lowest Model Layer

so2_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

so2_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: This variable represents the instantaneous surface so2 volume mixing ration at CF sites, sampled every 3 hours
so2_tavg-u-hm-u.long_name: Surface SO2 volume mixing ratio at CF sites

tactop_tavg-u-hxy-cl.comment: cloud_top refers to the top of the highest cloud. Air temperature is the bulk temperature of the air, not the surface (skin) temperature.

tatp_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: 2D monthly mean thermal tropopause calculated using WMO tropopause definition on 3d temperature

tntrl_tpt-l-hxys-u.long_name: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Longwave Radiative Heating

tntrs_tpt-l-hxys-u.long_name: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Shortwave Radiative Heating

tropoz_tavg-u-hm-u.comment: Tropospheric ozone column, should be consistent with definition of tropopause used to calculate the pressure of the tropopause (ptp).

ua_tavg-10hPa-hxy-air.comment: Zonal wind on the 10 hPa surface

ua_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Zonal wind (positive in a eastward direction).

va_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: Meridional wind (positive in a northward direction).

va_tavg-p39-hy-air.comment: Meridional wind (positive in a northward direction).

vt_tavg-100hPa-hy-air.comment: Zonally averaged eddy temperature flux at 100hPa as monthly means derived from daily (or higher frequency) fields.

wa_tavg-l-hxy-u.comment: A velocity is a vector quantity. "Upward" indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). Upward air velocity is the vertical component of the 3D air velocity vector. The standard name downward_air_velocity may be used for a vector component with the opposite sign convention.

wetbc_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Surface deposition rate of black carbon (dry mass) due to wet processes
wetbc_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

wetdust_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Surface deposition rate of dust (dry mass) due to wet processes

wetnh3_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Surface deposition rate of ammonia (NH3) due to wet processes

wetnh4_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Surface deposition rate of ammonium (NH4) due to wet processes

wetnoy_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: NOy is the sum of all simulated oxidized nitrogen species, out of NO, NO2, HNO3, HNO4, NO3aerosol, NO3(radical), N2O5, PAN, other organic nitrates.
wetnoy_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of NOy Including Aerosol Nitrate

wetoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Deposition rate of organic matter in aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes
wetoa_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter

wetso2_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Deposition rate of sulfur dioxide due to wet processes

wetss_tavg-u-hxy-u.comment: Deposition rate of sea salt aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes
wetss_tavg-u-hxy-u.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

zg_tavg-10hPa-hxy-air.comment: Geopotential height on the 10 hPa surface

zg_tpt-500hPa-hxy-air.cell_methods: area: mean where air time: point
zg_tpt-500hPa-hxy-air.comment: geopotential height on the 500 hPa surface
